short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a weighted score on vocabulary jams based on team size

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In Vocabulary Jams at vocabulary.com, the scores are not scaled by how big the teams are, giving big teams a huge advantage! So, this extension shows a weighted score that shows the average points per player to put all teams on equal footing.

It's a really simple extension that should work well, but let me know if it breaks.
